historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-197, see notes following § 3-1351.

DC CODE § 3-1358

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Commission may expend money in the Fund:
To effectuate the purposes of the Commission pursuant to the powers set forth in § 3-1354; and

To pay the Commission's costs to administer the Commission and the Fund; provided, that money expended for this purpose shall not in any fiscal year exceed 15% of the amount of funds deposited in the Fund during the same fiscal year.

Grants and financial support pursuant to § 3-1354(1) shall be used to complement, not supplement, existing resources, and to expand or encourage new initiatives to reduce the incidence of motor vehicle theft in the District of Columbia.

title.text: District of Columbia Boards and Commissions. (Refs & Annos)
